I'm also in need of a highly-rated hotel in Paris that fits the budget (assuming two meals) based on its minimum price. Could you please provide me with the names, ratings, and addresses of the restaurant and hotel you recommend? Thank you so much!

To help Emma find an authentic French restaurant and a highly-rated hotel within her budget of 500 euros for the day, I first need to identify top-rated options in Paris. I'll start by finding a list of highly-recommended restaurants and hotels.

For the restaurant, I will search for "top-rated French restaurants in Paris".

For the hotel, given that Emma's budget is limited to 500 euros for the entire day (including meals), I'll assume her accommodation budget might be around 200-300 euros per night. This will help narrow down affordable yet highly-rated options.
I need to find an alternative way to get the top-rated hotels in Paris with a budget of 250. I can try using the "search_hotels" function instead, which might provide similar results.
